meta.name: osu! typing
meta.tagline: click click click click click click
meta.description:
adds the typing sounds from osu standard into your discord client. it's like a sensory toy but on discord
*the default config values aim to replicate the actual way it works in osu*

randomize.description: Randomize the sounds played when typing

noBubbling.description: Disables repeated sounds on key hold

disabledKeys.description: Keys that will not play a sound when pressed
